account.withdraw.close.investment.title: Close investment
account.withdraw.close.investment.warnin: You can close your investment at any moment. Later you will be able to create a new investment into the same strategy. Note that after closing the investment drawdown will become 0.

The current equity of your investment is calculated by indicative quotes. When your investment is closed, all open positions will be closed by current market quotes which can slightly differ from the indicative ones.
account.withdraw.close.strategy.title: Сlose strategy
account.withdraw.close.strategy.warning: You can close an investment into your strategy only by closing the strategy itself. Please note that this action is irreversible.

strategy.add.form.label.name: Strategy name
strategy.add.form.label.step2: A strategy requires your investment into it. This investment can only be closed together with the strategy.
strategy.add.form.label.step2.bottom: You can set investment conditions and download the adviser in the next steps.
strategy.add.form.label.step3: A strategy will become available for investing after the creation of investment Conditions. If these Conditions are public, a strategy will appear in Rating. If they are not made public, a strategy will be available by using a unique link. Be advised that Conditions can't be changed after the creation, but you can change their visibility at any time.
strategy.add.script.download.title: Download signal script
strategy.add.script.message:
Your strategy has been created successfully.
To send signals from your MetaTrader 4 or MetaTrader 5 trading account, download the signal script and run it in your MetaTrader terminal.
You can also download it later by selecting the respective option in your strategy's context menu.
1. Before you launch the EA for the first time, please make sure that RAMM URL is in the list of allowed URLs in your MetaTrader.
For that, in menu Tools - Options - Expert Advisors add https://ramm.store/api/trading/v1/signals.send to table “Allow WebRequest for listed URL:”
2. Put the EA into any chart window.
Since now, all changes on your account will be copied to your strategy in RAMM.
strategy.add.script.title: Congratulations!
strategy.private.offer.label: The strategy will not have public Conditions, the strategy will be absent from the ratings and investment will only be possible through hidden links.
strategy.close.form.text: Do you confirm closing your strategy?
strategy.close.form.text2: If you had invested in your own strategy your investment account would also be closed. Please note that this action is irreversible.
strategy.details.message.chart: The chart shows the yield of the strategy according to the trader's investment. The yield is calculated without Trader's fee deduction.
strategy.details.message.closed: The trader has closed the strategy so it is no longer available for investing.
strategy.details.message.pageForbidden: This page is not visible to other users.
strategy.details.message.risk: Risk warning: the results of previous trading operations do not guarantee the same results in the future.
strategy.details.message.yieldMonthly: Monthly yield is an average yield (without Trader's fee deduction) based on the historical data and calculated since the strategy creation moment.

strategy.form.commission.hint: In addition to performance fee you can set up turnover fee for your strategy's investors. It cannot be changed after you create a strategy.
strategy.form.fee.hint: It won't be possible to change the fee rate later.

strategy.invest.form.title: Invest in strategy
strategy.invest.trader.form.text: The trader (owner) of the strategy can only invest under the special trader's conditions, with zero fee and turnover commission. In case you confirm the investment, it will be created according to the trader's Conditions.
